resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f9-965c-42d8-224a-ac1b1390d1f2#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Hieronymus Bosch: Keresztvitel, 1515-16 körül, Gent, Museum voor Schone Kunsten, 74x81 cm, olaj, fa.</string>
            <string language="en">Hieronymus Bosch: Cross Holding, About 1515-16, Gent, Museum voor Schone Kunsten, 74x81 cm, oil, Wood.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hieronymus Bosch: Kreuzholding, ungefähr 
1515-16, Herr, Museum voor Schone Kunsten, 74x81 Zentimeter, Öl, 
Holz.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hieronymus Bosch : Possession en travers, 
environ 1515-16, monsieur, voor Schone Kunsten, 74x81 centimètre, 
huile, bois de musée.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hieronymus Bosch: Terra arrendada 
transversal, aproximadamente 1515-16, gent, voor Schone Kunsten do 
museu, 74x81 cm, óleo, madeira.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hieronymus Bosch: Tenuta trasversale, 
circa 1515-16, gent, voor Schone Kunsten, 74x81 centimetro, olio, 
legno del museo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hieronymus Bosch: Διαγώνια εκμετάλλευση, 
περίπου 1515-16, Gent, voor Schone Kunsten, 74x81 
εκατ., πετρέλαιο, ξύλο μουσείων.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hieronymus Bosch: Tenencia cruzada, cerca 
de 1515-16, gent, voor Schone Kunsten, 74x81 centímetro, aceite, 
madera del museo.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Középen Krisztus arca, vállán a kerezst szára, baloldalt lent Szent Veronika, körülöttük torz, gonosz arcok</string>
            <string language="en">Jesus's Face In The Middle, The Cross Is On His Shoulder, On The Left At The Bottom Saint Veronica, Deformed And Wicked Faces Around Them</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Hieronymus Bosch,  15.század,  16.század,  későgótika,  keresztvitel,  Szent Veronika,  passió,  </string>
            <string language="en">Hieronymus Bosch,  15th Century,  16th Century, Late Gothic, Cross Holding,  Saint Veronica, Passion,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesicht Jesuss In der Mitte, Das Kreuz Ist Auf Seiner 
Schulter, Auf Dem Links An den Unteren Heiliger Veronica, Verformten 
Und Gemeinen Gesichtern Um Sie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Visage de Jésus Au Milieu, La Croix Est Sur Son 
Épaule, Du côté gauche Aux Visages de Veronica de Saint, Déformé 
Et Mauvais Inférieurs Autour d'Eux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Cara De Jesus No Meio, A Cruz Está Em Seu Ombro, Na 
Esquerda Nas Caras Inferiores Do Veronica De Saint, Deformado E As 
Más Em torno DElas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Faccia Del Jesus Nella Metà, La Traversa È Sulla Sua 
Spalla, A sinistra Alle Facce Deforme E Cattivo Inferiori Del Veronica
Del San, Intorno Loro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πρόσωπο του Ιησού στη μέση, ο σταυρός είναι στον 
ώμο του, στο αριστερό στο κατώτατο σημείο πρόσωπα Αγίου 
Βερόνικα, παραμορφωμένη και κακή γύρω από τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Cara De Jesús En El Centro, La Cruz Está En Su 
Hombro, A la izquierda En Las Caras Inferiores Del Veronica De Santo, 
Deformido Y Travieso Alrededor De Ellas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hieronymus Bosch, 15. Jahrhundert, 16. Jahrhundert, 
Spätes Gotisches, Kreuz-Holding, Heiliger Veronica, Neigung,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hieronymus Bosch, 15ème Siècle, 16ème Siècle, 
Défunt Gothique, Possession de Croix, Veronica de Saint, Passion,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hieronymus Bosch, 1ö Século, 1õ Século, Gothic 
Atrasado, Terra arrendada Da Cruz, Veronica De Saint, Paixão,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hieronymus Bosch, Quindicesimo Secolo, Sedicesimo 
Secolo, Tenuta Gotica E Trasversale Ritardata, Veronica Del San, 
Passione,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hieronymus Bosch, 15$ος αιώνας, 16$ος αιώνας, πρώην 
γοτθική, διαγώνια εκμετάλλευση, Αγιος Βερόνικα, πάθος,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hieronymus Bosch, Décimo quinto Siglo, Décimosexto 
Siglo, Último Gótico, Tenencia De la Cruz, Veronica De Santo, 
Pasión,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
